title: How to Write in Your Diary at School

steps.headline: Choose a small diary.
steps.description: This will be easier to hide in your desk and easier to hold. A regular notebook is good as well because it won't stand out among your other schoolbooks.

steps.headline: Write in it when your work is finished and at recess and lunch periods.
Keep your diary out on your desk and keep your arms wrapped around it while writing.
Write in it during class periods(when the teacher's not looking!)
steps.description: Also carry it with you to every class.

tyn: Something you want to write about
